ModMetaData.name: Alpha Muffalo (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of BaconBits mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=25580.msg260000#msg260000
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emipa606/RimWorld-Wrapper/master/Notice.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/AlphaMuffalo
--- Original Description --- Overrides the core textures and gives a more masculine look to the male muffalo. Original mod by Skullywag: "Muffalo Overhaul" https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18659.0
